title: Musicians E-commerce Site
description: A fast, scalable site for managing products, orders, and sales analytics. Built with React, Next.js, Firebase, and TailwindCSS.

title: Developer Portfolio Website
description: A redesign of a Developer Portfolio landing page, improving UI/UX and performance. Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript.

title: Shopping Cart Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome DevTools extension for managing shopping cart state in e-commerce applications. Built with React, TypeScript, and Chrome Extension APIs.
